name.description: Name that identifies this API Collection.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this API Collection. It could be title or label from the source services

description.description: Description of the API Collection instance. What it has and how to use it.

endpointURL.title: Endpoint URL
endpointURL.description: EndPoint URL for the API Collection. Capture the Root URL of the collection.

apiEndpoints.description: All the API's fullyQualifiedNames included in this API Collection.

service.description: Link to the API service fully qualified name where this API collection is hosted in

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.

domain.description: Fully qualified name of the domain the API Collection belongs to.

dataProducts.description: List of fully qualified names of data products this entity is part of.
